alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 2:30PM CST until November 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30-40 mph across areas of higher terrain along the Pine Ridge. * WHERE...Dawes, Box Butte, and Morrill Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST Thursday afternoon through 11 PM MST Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures are expected to be present on Friday and Friday night. Impacts to local agriculture, including the ranching community are possible as wind chills near or below zero will be present.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
